articles.author: Mark Muhich
articles.title: Trump’s Nuclear Weapons Tests Threaten Breach with Europe - CounterPunch.org
articles.description: The only remaining nuclear arms control treaty between the U.S. and Russia, the Strategic Arms Reduction Treaty, NewSTART, expires on February 5, 2026. Russia withdrew from NewSTART in 2023, but has adhered to the numerical limits of deployed nuclear weapons,…
articles.content:
Shot “Baker”, part of Operation Crossroads, a nuclear test by the United States at Bikini Atoll in 1946. Photo. US Department of Defense.
